timeline.message: #559 Refactor IOSConfiguration to ReleaseConfiguration, to extend it for iOS and Android configuration
Apply changes for Android target, including test
Update initial plist when different values in releaseConfiguration are set
Update user’s manifest when there are changes set in releaseConfiguration

timeline.bodyText: There should be a check for empty passwords. In any case, can't we even skip printing the first character of passwords?
timeline.author: tiainen

replies.bodyText: hmm, it doesn't make much sense to call runner.setSecretArgs(""), but that will cause an exception. I'll fix it.
replies.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText: In fact, the issue affects the regular setArg("") call, as that can lead to errors when processing the command, but this is probably for another issue.
replies.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText: OK. If you spotted another issue, please file it before it gets forgotten.
replies.author: tiainen

timeline.author: tiainen

timeline.bodyText: Change printed variable name as well.
timeline.author: tiainen
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -298,7 +298,7 @@ public String toString() {
                 ", compilerArgs=" + compilerArgs +
                 ", appId='" + appId + '\'' +
                 ", appName='" + appName + '\'' +
-                ", iosConfiguration='" + iosSigningConfiguration + '\'' +
+                ", iosConfiguration='" + releaseConfiguration + '\'' +

timeline.bodyText: Change printed variable name as well.
timeline.author: tiainen
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -498,7 +497,7 @@ public String toString() {
                 ", runtimeArgsList=" + runtimeArgsList +
                 ", releaseSymbolsList=" + releaseSymbolsList +
                 ", appName='" + getAppName() + '\'' +
-                ", iosConfiguration='" + iosSigningConfiguration + '\'' +
+                ", iosConfiguration='" + releaseConfiguration + '\'' +

timeline.bodyText: itemName refers to an XML attribute of the XML element tag? Perhaps rename it to attributeName?
timeline.author: tiainen

timeline.bodyText: Did you really mean contains instead of equals? If so, you might want to add this information in the javadoc.
timeline.author: tiainen

replies.bodyText: Yes, I meant contains (the reason is we can have different namespaces android:... or a:...)
replies.author: jperedadnr

timeline.author: tiainen

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of the Optional pattern, you might want to consider this:
String bundleName = Objects.requireNonNullElse(releaseConfiguration.getBundleName(), appName);
timeline.author: tiainen

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure that keyPass and keyStorePass shouldn't be switched?
timeline.author: tiainen
